Landing the shuttle the party is able to emerge into a small clearing.
In the distance they can still detect the village, most of the
inhabitants appear to be performing normal daily chores: Cooking,
cleaning, mending or makng clothes and weapons. The smell of food
could be detected in the air. At a nearby river some wee even washing
clothes and other daily items.

However three figures, protohumans by the look of them, dressed in
robes like WINDLORD had seen earlier, were walking off in a whole
different direction one pushing an ancient version of a wheel barrel.

(TAG)

- Preston
